path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Arkarus Token - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Unnecessary usage of SafeMath library in Solidity 0.8.0+
findings.description: The contract uses SafeMath library for overflow checking, which is unnecessary since Solidity 0.8.0+ does this by default. It's recommended to use normal arithmetic operators for readability and gas saving.

findings.title: Mint public function allows owner contract can mint unlimited tokens
findings.description: The mint public function in Arkarus token contract allows the owner to mint unlimited tokens, which can change the totalSupply value.
